name: 50% Arabica - 50% Robusta- Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
• Our range of premium blends seamlessly combine the exquisite flavours of single-origin, shade-grown AA-Grade Arabica and Robusta beans, creating a unique flavour profile. 
  • FLAVOUR NOTES: This particular blend gets its layered and naunced flavours from the Arabica beans, with the Robusta beans adding the right amount of brightness and acidity, making it a perfectly balanced cup.
  • DRINKING PREFERENCES: Best enjoyed black. Great for brewing an Espresso, Risteretto or Cortado.
  • Our 1 kg and 5 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet.
